articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: ‘Indian minister had a point’: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz quotes Jaishankar’s ‘European mindset’ remark - The Indian Express
articles.description: During the 17th edition of the GLOBSEC Bratislava Forum in Slovakia in June last year, EAM Jaishankar had said: "Europe has to grow out of the mindset that Europe's problems are the world's problems, but the world's problems are not Europe's problems."
articles.content: Asserting that Indian External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar had a point when he spoke last year about the “European mindset”, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said that it “wouldn’t be Europe’s problem… [+2728 chars]
